subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mariners outfielder Ichiro Suzuki entered the season 130 hits short of 3,000 for his two-country career and could become the youngest player in history to reach that professional milestone.
snippet: Mariners outfielder Ichiro Suzuki entered the season 130 hits short of 3,000 for his two-country career and could become the youngest player in history to reach that professional milestone.
